review: Short Summary:Worth the money! Purchased for working extended hours outdoors in subpar conditions & for a trip to Alaska. Yes, they are pricier than others. HOWEVER, the saying “you get what you pay for” is positively true!Detailed Summary:My husband (who is hot natured) purchased a set last winter when he was stuck outside at work for extended hours on end in subpar weather. He couldn’t say enough good things about how comfortable & warm they kept him.He was able to comfortably layer them underneath his work clothes and I n no way did they restrict or prohibit any movement nor cause him to sweat when he was working intensely setting & cleaning up trench pumps, boxes, wading through mud with LDH, etc.(For reference he’s 5’12”, 300# & purchased size: 2XL. He wears 3XL shirts & 44 x 32 jeans)Also, due to my husband’s recommendation, purchased a set for my mother to wear in Alaska on her cruise & excursions. For transparency at first she was rather skeptical but after wearing them she’s never wearing anything else! As soon as she could she excitedly sent me a message with the BIGGEST THANK YOU ever for my husband recommending them & me purchasing them for her. She said others were complaining about freezing yet she’s never been so comfortably warm outside in cold weather!Both my mother & husband said they fit more snugly than they were use to how other brands fit. However, that’s how these are intended to fit. Neither of them like clothing to fit tightly… until they wore these & only these! (It’s only my assumption that if your deciding factor on whether or not to purchase them is due to wanting a looser fit that you could, obviously, order up from your normal size. However, in my opinion, I think that’s slightly defeating their purposefully intended design.)Hope this has helped with any decision making information you were looking for!Read more
These keep you warm in the coldest temps but are lightweightRead more

My husband has owned the 3.0 for 10 years & decided it was time to upgrade ! There is nothing wrong other than normal wear with the 3.0’s , he just wanted to purchase the 4.0’s since we are going to be in a colder climate than usual for winter ! If the 4.0’s are as good of quality as the 3.0’s, they’re worth every dime ! We purchased from Amazon because they were almost $20 cheaper per item than buying from a stand alone store !! They are great quality, the hubs says they feel great too !!Read more
This works Great for cold (single digits, high wind teens and sub zero) weather. Keeps me warm and wicks water away to keep you free of moisture.. Would highly recommend.Read more
Works goodRead more

The quality and thickness are good. Thicker than what I wanted or expected. But quite a bit thinner than the other brands I’ve used. Sizing seems a bit off. I ordered my size according to their guide and ai generated size which matched. And they are for me a bit on the snug side. But for what I need them for they will work. As for the price I can’t really say. I feel they are a bit pricey but if they do what I hope they will do it will be worth it. Will I buy it again most likely. Will I buy a different size, most likely.Read more

We had a few really cold days here in Northeast Ohio and I wore these while working outside. What a difference they make. These are so warm! I see other people say some cheaper ones are just as warm but I haven’t found any that hold a candle to these yet. Great fit and super warm.Read more
Comfort with winter days. Wind stoppers. Great looking. Medium thickness.Read more
Bought for my husband for Christmas, had to return and get a different size as these run TIGHT. But now that I have gotten the next size up they fit well and he is nice and warm.Read more
Ordered larger size. Fits well and warm. Great product !!!Read more
Will keep your legs and thighs warm, and wind out. If you spend time outdoors in many cold winter months (-20 degrees or more), make sure to have two or three of these in your wardrobe.Read more
Thermal quality is good, comfort fit and correct sizing. Albeit pricey it was worth the money.Read more
Best warm weather gear they have come out with.Read more
